{"id":1367586770,"question_id":125,"lang":"cpp","lang_name":"C++","time":"3Â months","timestamp":1724569099,"status":10,"status_display":"Accepted","runtime":"4 ms","url":"/submissions/detail/1367586770/","is_pending":"Not Pending","title":"Valid Palindrome","memory":"8.9 MB","code":"class Solution {\npublic:\n    bool isPalindrome(string s) {\n        int start=0;\n        int end=s.size()-1;\n        \n        while(start<=end){\n            if(!isalnum(s[start])){\n                start++; \n                continue;\n            }\n            if(!isalnum(s[end])){\n                end--;\n                continue;\n            }\n            if(tolower(s[start])!=tolower(s[end])){\n                return false;\n            }\n            else{\n                start++;\n                end--;\n            }\n        }\n        return true;\n    }\n};","compare_result":"","title_slug":"valid-palindrome","has_notes":false,"flag_type":1}
